bug.author: abhishekpratapa
bug.description: This build fails with: <denchmark-code>usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lbz2 collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status src/model_server/CMakeFiles/unity_shared.dir/build.make:1111: recipe for target 'src/model_server/libunity_shared.so' failed make[2]: *** [src/model_server/libunity_shared.so] Error 1 CMakeFiles/Makefile2:967: recipe for target 'src/model_server/CMakeFiles/unity_shared.dir/all' failed make[1]: *** [src/model_server/CMakeFiles/unity_shared.dir/all] Error 2 Makefile:83: recipe for target 'all' failed make: *** [all] Error 2 </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/abhishekpratapa>@abhishekpratapa</denchmark-link> can you verify if this is fixed, and if so close the issue?
It's not fixed. Still happens to me.
